Articles.Content:
I got the game a week or two ago and spent some time with a range of missions to the Mun and Minmus (with varying success!). Now that 0.20 came out, I decided to restart my game and use what i'd learnt to try and be a bit more consistent and leave less space junk lying around..

Here's a screenshot of my first Mun landing with Jebediah, he made it back to Kerbin too!
Welcome to both KSP and the forums!

Welcome to the forums!

Nice Mun landing! I still remember my first one; those memories really stick with you.

New updates are always an excuse to start with a clean slate, too.

If you get stuck on any particular aspect of the game, or if you just want to hone your skills a little more, stop by the Drawing Board (link in my sig), which has a number of useful reference materials. Don't be afraid to ask questions in the How To section of the forums, either.

Happy landings!
